titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to suspend the penalty on underpayments of Federal income tax for unemployed individuals.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to suspend the penalty on underpayments of Federal income tax for unemployed individuals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to suspend the penalty on underpayments of tax due to negligence, disregard of rules or regulations, or substantial inaccuracies for individuals who receive unemployment compensation in 2008 or 2009.
